edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler

Class WolfScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler

  • public class WolfScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a schedule that courses can be added to or removed from
    Author:
    Caitlyn
